title: Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP (using REST API)
descriptionMarkdown: The [Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP](https://prisma.pan.dev/api/cloud/cwpp/audits/#operation/get-audits-incidents) data connector allows you to connect to your Prisma Cloud CWPP instance and ingesting alerts into Microsoft Sentinel. The data connector is built on Microsoft Sentinelâ€™s Codeless Connector Platform and uses the Prisma Cloud API to fetch security events and supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview) that parses the received security event data into a custom columns so that queries don't need to parse it again, thus resulting in better performance.
